name: Dig Deeper
description:
"Welcome to the crew, miner! The job you've signed up for is pretty self explanatory and we're sure that you've been outfitted with gear by now, but you may have noticed how heavy your model of jackhammer is. Heavy duty hammers like these allow us to dig further down than any other firm. 'What if I miss something?', you ask? Well that's your job to figure it out as you go!"

- Dwarf Co. Management

"Dig Deeper" is a peaceful, vertical mining game. Explore various biomes, unlock new workers, hats, and tools, and some ale for your shift!

(NOTE: Android version contains 4 extra cosmetics and a playable character as a thank you for donating and supporting my work.)

PC version supports local Co-op.
